Servicemeldung:
Informationen zu Auffälligkeiten und Datenproblemen dokumentieren wir bei uns im Audio-Blog: LINK

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", GREATEST(0,$filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('$Podcast_title'))), '$Podcast_title'), 
FROM(
SELECT '$Podcast_title' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", GREATEST($filled_size_headline_small - CHAR_LENGTH('QApps'),0)), 'Apps')
FROM(
SELECT 'Apps' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(summe as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(summe) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
  SELECT 
    SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe 
  FROM 
    $episode_dataset
  WHERE 
    broadcast_id IN ($podcast_ids)
    AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_big - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(ROUND(summe,0) as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(summe) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
  SELECT
    SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe,
  FROM 
    $episode_dataset as ed
  LEFT JOIN 
    $profiles_dataset AS pd
  USING(podcast_title)
  LEFT JOIN 
    Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_publication_dates 
  USING (headline)
  WHERE 
    ed.broadcast_id IN ($podcast_ids)
    AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
    AND $episodenschnitt_condition
    AND DATE(publication_date_6) BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
)

panels.description:
Nutzungsverteilung im Nutzungszeitraum neu veröffentlichter
Episoden vs. älterer Episoden (Longtail) an Zugriffen gesamt.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(publication_date_6) BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin") THEN m_zugriffe_1 ELSE 0 END) AS new_episode_sum,
  SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(publication_date_6) NOT BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin") THEN m_zugriffe_1 ELSE 0 END) AS longtail_sum,
FROM 
  $episode_dataset as ed
LEFT JOIN 
  $profiles_dataset AS pd
USING(podcast_title)
LEFT JOIN 
  Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_publication_dates 
USING (headline)
WHERE 
  ed.broadcast_id IN ($podcast_ids)
  AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
  AND $episodenschnitt_condition

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH('ARD Audiothek')), 'ARD Audiothek')
FROM(
SELECT 'ARD Audiothek' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

panels.description: Nutzungsanteil der im Analysezeitraum neu veröffentlichten Episoden an den gesamten Zugriffen.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_big - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(ROUND(summe,0) as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(summe) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."), "%")FROM
(
  SELECT
    (SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(publication_date_6) BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin") THEN m_zugriffe_1 ELSE 0 END)/SUM(m_zugriffe_1)) * 100 AS summe,
  FROM 
    $episode_dataset as ed
  LEFT JOIN 
    $profiles_dataset AS pd
  USING(podcast_title)
  LEFT JOIN 
    Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_publication_dates 
  USING (headline)
  WHERE 
    ed.broadcast_id IN ($podcast_ids)
    AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
    AND $episodenschnitt_condition
)

panels.description: Durchschnitt pro Episode für die im ausgewählten Analysezeitraum neu veröffentlichten Episoden nach X Tagen. ACHTUNG: Die Stichprobe der Episoden variiert je nach betrachtetem Zeitintervall. So ist unter Umständen auch ein kleinerer Wert für 56 Tage als für 28 Tage möglich. Für robuste Ergebnisse bitte einen möglichst langen Analysezeitraum wählen.

targets.rawSql:
WITH raw_data AS (
  -- This is the raw data, including either all episodes or only the selected ones, ensuring their podcasts are included in the average calculation, and the publication date falls within the selected time period
  SELECT 
    date,
    headline, 
    SUM(IFNULL(m_zugriffe_1,0)) AS zugriffe,
    publication_date_6,
  FROM $episode_dataset AS episode_dataset
  LEFT JOIN $profiles_dataset AS pd
  USING(podcast_title)
  LEFT JOIN Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_publication_dates 
  USING (headline)
  WHERE 
    ("$Bereich" = "Alle Bereiche" OR episode_dataset.branding = "$Bereich")
    AND ("""$Podcast""" = "All titles" OR REPLACE(headline, "'", "") IN UNNEST(ARRAY[$Episode]))
    AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
    AND publication_date_6 BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
    AND $episodenschnitt_condition 
  GROUP BY date, headline, publication_date_6
), ranked_episodes AS(
  -- This step ranks episodes according to their total zugriffe across the entire period
  SELECT
    headline,
    publication_date_6,
    RANK() OVER(ORDER BY zugriffe DESC) AS rang
  FROM (
  SELECT 
    headline,
    publication_date_6,
    SUM(zugriffe) AS zugriffe,
  FROM raw_data
  GROUP BY headline, publication_date_6
  )
), date_range AS (
  -- Create a full date range to handle cases where episodes have no zugriffe on some days
  SELECT 
    date 
  FROM UNNEST(GENERATE_DATE_ARRAY(DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin"), DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin"))) AS date
), filtered_date_range AS (
  -- Join date range with episodes, keeping only dates between publication and max date (to include the 5-day delay) 
  SELECT date, headline, publication_date_6, rang
  FROM date_range
  JOIN ranked_episodes
  ON date >= publication_date_6 AND date <= "$max_date"
), cumulative_sum_ranked_episodes AS (
SELECT 
  -- Calculate the cumulative sum of zugriffe and the number of days since publication for each episode
  filtered_date_range.headline, 
  DATE_DIFF(filtered_date_range.date, filtered_date_range.publication_date_6, DAY) + 1 AS days_since_pub,
  SUM(IFNULL(zugriffe, 0)) OVER (PARTITION BY filtered_date_range.headline ORDER BY filtered_date_range.date) AS summe, 
  "${type}" AS type, 
  filtered_date_range.rang
FROM filtered_date_range
LEFT JOIN raw_data
ON filtered_date_range.date = raw_data.date AND REPLACE(filtered_date_range.headline, "'", "") = REPLACE(raw_data.headline, "'", "")
), avg_data AS (
  -- Compute the daily average zugriffe across all episodes for days up to max_day_since_pub
  SELECT 
    "Durchschnitt alle neuen Episoden" AS headline,
    days_since_pub,
    AVG(summe) AS summe,
    "${type}" AS type,
    0 AS rang
  FROM cumulative_sum_ranked_episodes
  GROUP BY days_since_pub
)
SELECT CONCAT("nach ", days_since_pub, " Tagen") AS period, ROUND(summe) AS value, days_since_pub AS rank  FROM avg_data
WHERE days_since_pub IN (7, 14, 28, 56, 91)
ORDER by rank DESC

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(summe as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(summe) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(

    SAFE_DIVIDE(SUM(m_zugriffe_1),COUNT(DISTINCT headline)) AS summe 
  FROM 
    $episode_dataset
  WHERE

    AND ("""$Podcast""" = "All titles" OR REPLACE(headline, "'", "") IN UNNEST(ARRAY[$Episode]))

SELECT
    date,
    SUM(CASE WHEN platform = 'ARD Audiothek' THEN m_zugriffe_1 ELSE 0 END) AS ard_summe,
    SUM(CASE WHEN platform = 'Apple Podcasts' THEN m_zugriffe_1 ELSE 0 END) AS apple_summe,
    SUM(CASE WHEN platform = 'Spotify' THEN m_zugriffe_1 ELSE 0 END) AS spotify_summe,

SELECT " "

panels.description:
Abgetragen sind die absoluten Zugriffe der jeweiligen Episode am
jeweiligen Tag. Als Standard werden die Top 8 Episoden ausgewiesen; über die Episodenauswahl
im Filtermenü können stattdessen bis zu 8 spezifische Episoden ausgewiesen werden.

targets.rawSql:
WITH raw_data AS (
  SELECT 
    date,
    headline, 
    SUM(IFNULL(m_zugriffe_1,0)) AS zugriffe,
    publication_date_6,
  FROM $episode_dataset
  LEFT JOIN Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_publication_dates 
  USING (headline)
  WHERE 
    ("$Bereich" = "Alle Bereiche" OR branding = "$Bereich")
    AND ("""$Podcast""" = "All titles" OR REPLACE(headline, "'", "") IN UNNEST(ARRAY[$Episode]))
    AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
  GROUP BY date, headline, publication_date_6
), ranked_episodes AS(
  SELECT
    headline,
    publication_date_6,
    RANK() OVER(ORDER BY zugriffe DESC) AS rang
  FROM (
  SELECT 
    headline,
    publication_date_6,
    SUM(zugriffe) AS zugriffe,
  FROM raw_data
  GROUP BY headline, publication_date_6
  )
  QUALIFY rang <= 8
), date_range AS (
  SELECT 
    date 
  FROM UNNEST(GENERATE_DATE_ARRAY(DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin"), DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin"))) AS date
), filtered_date_range AS (
  SELECT date, headline, rang
  FROM date_range
  JOIN ranked_episodes
  ON date >= publication_date_6 AND date <= "$max_date"
)
SELECT 
  filtered_date_range.headline, 
  filtered_date_range.date, 
  IFNULL(zugriffe,0) AS zugriffe, 
  "${type}" AS type, 
  filtered_date_range.rang
FROM filtered_date_range
LEFT JOIN raw_data
ON filtered_date_range.date = raw_data.date AND REPLACE(filtered_date_range.headline, "'", "") = REPLACE(raw_data.headline, "'", "")
ORDER BY headline, date ASC

panels.title: Zugriffe pro Tag für ausgewählte Episoden von "$Podcast_title"

panels.description:
Abgetragen sind die kumulierten Zugriffe nach 1, 2, ..., X Tagen für im
ausgewählten Analysezeitraum neu veröffentlichte Episoden. Der Durchschnitt bezieht sich auf
sämtliche neue Episoden, nicht nur auf die in der Grafik einzeln dargestellten. Als Standard
werden die Top 8 neuen Episoden ausgewiesen; über die Episodenauswahl im Filtermenü können
stattdessen bis zu 8 spezifische Episoden ausgewiesen werden.

targets.rawSql:
WITH raw_data AS (
  -- This is the raw data, including either all episodes or only the selected ones, ensuring their podcasts are included in the average calculation, and the publication date falls within the selected time period
  SELECT 
    date,
    headline, 
    SUM(IFNULL(m_zugriffe_1,0)) AS zugriffe,
    publication_date_6,
  FROM $episode_dataset AS episode_dataset
  LEFT JOIN $profiles_dataset AS pd
  USING(podcast_title)
  LEFT JOIN Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_publication_dates 
  USING (headline)
  WHERE 
    ("$Bereich" = "Alle Bereiche" OR episode_dataset.branding = "$Bereich")
    AND ("""$Podcast""" = "All titles" OR REPLACE(headline, "'", "") IN UNNEST(ARRAY[$Episode]))
    AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
    AND publication_date_6 BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
    AND $episodenschnitt_condition 
  GROUP BY date, headline, publication_date_6
), ranked_episodes AS(
  -- This step ranks episodes according to their total zugriffe across the entire period
  SELECT
    headline,
    publication_date_6,
    RANK() OVER(ORDER BY zugriffe DESC) AS rang
  FROM (
  SELECT 
    headline,
    publication_date_6,
    SUM(zugriffe) AS zugriffe,
  FROM raw_data
  GROUP BY headline, publication_date_6
  )
), date_range AS (
  -- Create a full date range to handle cases where episodes have no zugriffe on some days
  SELECT 
    date 
  FROM UNNEST(GENERATE_DATE_ARRAY(DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin"), DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin"))) AS date
), filtered_date_range AS (
  -- Join date range with episodes, keeping only dates between publication and max date (to include the 5-day delay) 
  SELECT date, headline, publication_date_6, rang
  FROM date_range
  JOIN ranked_episodes
  ON date >= publication_date_6 AND date <= "$max_date"
), cumulative_sum_ranked_episodes AS (
SELECT 
  -- Calculate the cumulative sum of zugriffe and the number of days since publication for each episode
  filtered_date_range.headline, 
  DATE_DIFF(filtered_date_range.date, filtered_date_range.publication_date_6, DAY) + 1 AS days_since_pub,
  SUM(IFNULL(zugriffe, 0)) OVER (PARTITION BY filtered_date_range.headline ORDER BY filtered_date_range.date) AS summe, 
  "${type}" AS type, 
  filtered_date_range.rang
FROM filtered_date_range
LEFT JOIN raw_data
ON filtered_date_range.date = raw_data.date AND REPLACE(filtered_date_range.headline, "'", "") = REPLACE(raw_data.headline, "'", "")
), top_episodes AS (
  -- Top episodes
  SELECT * FROM cumulative_sum_ranked_episodes
  WHERE rang <= 8
), max_days_since_pub_top_episodes AS(
  -- Retrieve the highest days_since_pub value from top episodes
  SELECT MAX(days_since_pub) AS max_day_since_pub
  FROM top_episodes
), avg_data AS (
  -- Compute the daily average zugriffe across all episodes for days up to max_day_since_pub
  SELECT 
    "Durchschnitt alle neuen Episoden" AS headline,
    days_since_pub,
    AVG(summe) AS summe,
    "${type}" AS type,
    0 AS rang
  FROM cumulative_sum_ranked_episodes
  --JOIN max_days_since_pub_top_episodes
  --ON days_since_pub <= max_day_since_pub
  GROUP BY days_since_pub
), final_data AS(
  -- Final data
  SELECT * FROM top_episodes
  WHERE days_since_pub <= $Tage_content_lifetime
  UNION ALL
  SELECT * FROM avg_data
  WHERE days_since_pub <= $Tage_content_lifetime
), day_zero AS(
  -- Create day zero to ensure all episodes and the average start at 0
  SELECT DISTINCT
    headline, 
    0 AS days_since_pub,
    0 AS summe, 
    "${type}" AS type, 
    rang
  FROM final_data
)
SELECT * FROM final_data
UNION DISTINCT
SELECT * FROM day_zero
ORDER BY headline, days_since_pub ASC

panels.title: Tage nach Erstveröffentlichung für ausgewählte Episoden von "$Podcast_title"

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  podcast_title,
  headline,
  publication_date_6,
  SUM(m_zugriffe_1) as zugriffe
FROM $episode_dataset
LEFT JOIN Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_publication_dates 
USING (headline)
WHERE 
  ("$Bereich" = "Alle Bereiche" OR branding = "$Bereich")
  AND ("""$Podcast""" = "All titles" OR REPLACE(headline, "'", "") IN UNNEST(ARRAY[$Episode]))
  AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
GROUP BY podcast_title, headline, publication_date_6
ORDER BY zugriffe DESC

SELECT
    podcast_title AS Title,
    SUM(CASE WHEN platform = 'ARD Audiothek' THEN m_zugriffe_1 ELSE NULL END) AS ard_summe,
    SUM(CASE WHEN platform = 'Apple Podcasts' THEN m_zugriffe_1 ELSE NULL END) AS apple_summe,
    SUM(CASE WHEN platform = 'Spotify' THEN m_zugriffe_1 ELSE NULL END) AS spotify_summe,
    SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS zugriffe,
FROM 
    $platform_dataset AS platform_table
LEFT JOIN $profiles_dataset AS profiles_table
ON platform_table.broadcast_id = profiles_table.broadcast_id[0]
WHERE
    platform_table.broadcast_id IN ($podcast_ids)
    AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
GROUP BY podcast_title
ORDER BY zugriffe DESC

panels.description:
Abgetragen sind die kumulierten Zugriffe nach 7, 14, 28, 56 und 91 Tagen
für im ausgewählten Analysezeitraum neu veröffentlichte Episoden aller ausgewählten Podcasts.
Über das Dropdown-Menü oben links kann ein individueller Zeitraum zwischen 1 und 99 Tagen
definiert werden. ACHTUNG: Die Stichprobe der Episoden variiert je nach betrachtetem
Zeitintervall. So ist unter Umständen auch ein kleinerer Wert für 56 Tage als für 28 Tage möglich.
Für robuste Ergebnisse bitte einen möglichst langen Analysezeitraum wählen.

targets.rawSql:
WITH raw_data AS (
  -- This is the raw data, including either all episodes or only the selected ones, ensuring their podcasts are included in the average calculation, and the publication date falls within the selected time period
  SELECT 
    date,
    podcast_title,
    headline, 
    SUM(IFNULL(m_zugriffe_1,0)) AS zugriffe,
    publication_date_6,
  FROM $episode_dataset AS episode_dataset
  LEFT JOIN $profiles_dataset AS pd
  USING(podcast_title)
  LEFT JOIN Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_publication_dates 
  USING (headline)
  WHERE 
    ("$Bereich" = "Alle Bereiche" OR episode_dataset.branding = "$Bereich")
    AND ("""$Podcast""" = "All titles" OR REPLACE(headline, "'", "") IN UNNEST(ARRAY[$Episode]))
    AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
    AND publication_date_6 BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
    AND $episodenschnitt_condition 
  GROUP BY date, podcast_title, headline, publication_date_6
), ranked_episodes AS(
  -- This step ranks episodes according to their total zugriffe across the entire period
  SELECT
    podcast_title,
    headline,
    publication_date_6,
    RANK() OVER(ORDER BY zugriffe DESC) AS rang
  FROM (
  SELECT
    podcast_title, 
    headline,
    publication_date_6,
    SUM(zugriffe) AS zugriffe,
  FROM raw_data
  GROUP BY podcast_title, headline, publication_date_6
  )
), date_range AS (
  -- Create a full date range to handle cases where episodes have no zugriffe on some days
  SELECT 
    date 
  FROM UNNEST(GENERATE_DATE_ARRAY(DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin"), DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin"))) AS date
), filtered_date_range AS (
  -- Join date range with episodes, keeping only dates between publication and max date (to include the 5-day delay) 
  SELECT date, podcast_title, headline, publication_date_6, rang
  FROM date_range
  JOIN ranked_episodes
  ON date >= publication_date_6 AND date <= "$max_date"
), cumulative_sum_ranked_episodes AS (
SELECT 
  -- Calculate the cumulative sum of zugriffe and the number of days since publication for each episode
  filtered_date_range.podcast_title,
  filtered_date_range.headline, 
  DATE_DIFF(filtered_date_range.date, filtered_date_range.publication_date_6, DAY) + 1 AS days_since_pub,
  SUM(IFNULL(zugriffe, 0)) OVER (PARTITION BY filtered_date_range.headline ORDER BY filtered_date_range.date) AS summe, 
  "${type}" AS type, 
  filtered_date_range.rang
FROM filtered_date_range
LEFT JOIN raw_data
ON filtered_date_range.date = raw_data.date AND REPLACE(filtered_date_range.headline, "'", "") = REPLACE(raw_data.headline, "'", "")
), avg_data AS (
  -- Compute the daily average zugriffe across all episodes for days up to max_day_since_pub
  SELECT 
    podcast_title,
    days_since_pub,
    AVG(summe) AS summe,
    "${type}" AS type,
    0 AS rang
  FROM cumulative_sum_ranked_episodes
  GROUP BY podcast_title,days_since_pub
)
SELECT 
  podcast_title,
  ROUND(MAX(CASE WHEN days_since_pub = 7 THEN summe END)) AS days7,
  ROUND(MAX(CASE WHEN days_since_pub = 14 THEN summe END)) AS days14,
  ROUND(MAX(CASE WHEN days_since_pub = 28 THEN summe END)) AS days28,
  ROUND(MAX(CASE WHEN days_since_pub = 56 THEN summe END)) AS days56,
  ROUND(MAX(CASE WHEN days_since_pub = 91 THEN summe END)) AS days91,
  ROUND(MAX(CASE WHEN days_since_pub = $Tage THEN summe END)) AS daysCustom,
FROM avg_data
GROUP BY podcast_title
ORDER BY podcast_title

WITH raw_data AS (
  -- This is the raw data, including either all episodes or only the selected ones, ensuring their podcasts are included in the average calculation, and the publication date falls within the selected time period
  SELECT 
    date,
    podcast_title,
    headline, 
    SUM(IFNULL(m_zugriffe_1,0)) AS zugriffe,
    publication_date_6,
  FROM $episode_dataset AS episode_dataset
  LEFT JOIN $profiles_dataset AS pd
  USING(podcast_title)
  LEFT JOIN Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_publication_dates 
  USING (headline)
  WHERE 
    ("$Bereich" = "Alle Bereiche" OR episode_dataset.branding = "$Bereich")
    AND ("""$Podcast""" = "All titles" OR REPLACE(headline, "'", "") IN UNNEST(ARRAY[$Episode]))
    AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
    AND publication_date_6 BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
    AND $episodenschnitt_condition 
  GROUP BY date, podcast_title, headline, publication_date_6
), ranked_episodes AS(
  -- This step ranks episodes according to their total zugriffe across the entire period
  SELECT
    podcast_title,
    headline,
    publication_date_6,
    RANK() OVER(ORDER BY zugriffe DESC) AS rang
  FROM (
  SELECT
    podcast_title, 
    headline,
    publication_date_6,
    SUM(zugriffe) AS zugriffe,
  FROM raw_data
  GROUP BY podcast_title, headline, publication_date_6
  )
), date_range AS (
  -- Create a full date range to handle cases where episodes have no zugriffe on some days
  SELECT 
    date 
  FROM UNNEST(GENERATE_DATE_ARRAY(DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin"), DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin"))) AS date
), filtered_date_range AS (
  -- Join date range with episodes, keeping only dates between publication and max date (to include the 5-day delay) 
  SELECT date, podcast_title, headline, publication_date_6, rang
  FROM date_range
  JOIN ranked_episodes
  ON date >= publication_date_6 AND date <= "$max_date"
), cumulative_sum_ranked_episodes AS (
SELECT 
  -- Calculate the cumulative sum of zugriffe and the number of days since publication for each episode
  filtered_date_range.podcast_title,
  filtered_date_range.headline, 
  DATE_DIFF(filtered_date_range.date, filtered_date_range.publication_date_6, DAY) + 1 AS days_since_pub,
  SUM(IFNULL(zugriffe, 0)) OVER (PARTITION BY filtered_date_range.headline ORDER BY filtered_date_range.date) AS summe, 
  "${type}" AS type, 
  filtered_date_range.rang
FROM filtered_date_range
LEFT JOIN raw_data
ON filtered_date_range.date = raw_data.date AND REPLACE(filtered_date_range.headline, "'", "") = REPLACE(raw_data.headline, "'", "")
), avg_data AS (
  -- Compute the daily average zugriffe across all episodes for days up to max_day_since_pub
  SELECT 
    podcast_title,
    days_since_pub,
    AVG(summe) AS summe,
    "${type}" AS type,
    0 AS rang
  FROM cumulative_sum_ranked_episodes
  GROUP BY podcast_title,days_since_pub
), avg_per_podcast AS(
SELECT 
  podcast_title,
  ROUND(MAX(CASE WHEN days_since_pub = 7 THEN summe END)) AS days7,
  ROUND(MAX(CASE WHEN days_since_pub = 14 THEN summe END)) AS days14,
  ROUND(MAX(CASE WHEN days_since_pub = 28 THEN summe END)) AS days28,
  ROUND(MAX(CASE WHEN days_since_pub = 56 THEN summe END)) AS days56,
  ROUND(MAX(CASE WHEN days_since_pub = 91 THEN summe END)) AS days91,
  ROUND(MAX(CASE WHEN days_since_pub = $Tage THEN summe END)) AS daysCustom,
FROM avg_data
GROUP BY podcast_title)
SELECT
  "Durchschnitt $Podcast_title",
  ROUND(AVG(days7)) AS days7,
  ROUND(AVG(days14)) AS days14,
  ROUND(AVG(days28)) AS days28,
  ROUND(AVG(days56)) AS days56,
  ROUND(AVG(days91)) AS days91,
  ROUND(AVG(daysCustom)) AS daysCustom,
  FROM avg_per_podcast

SELECT
    date,
    "${type}" as type,
    SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS zugriffe,
    "$Plattformen" as platform,
    DATE_DIFF(DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin"),DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin"),DAY) + 1 as timeRange
FROM 
    $platform_dataset
WHERE
    broadcast_id IN ($podcast_ids)
    AND ("$Plattformen" = "Alle Plattformen" OR platform = "$Plattformen")
    AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date ASC

query.rawSql:
SELECT podcast_title FROM(
(SELECT DISTINCT REPLACE(podcast_title,'"','') AS podcast_title,  1 AS sort  FROM $profiles_dataset
ORDER BY sort,podcast_title DESC
)
UNION ALL (SELECT "None", -1 as sort)
)
ORDER BY SORT, LOWER(podcast_title) ASC

WITH toDate AS(
  SELECT CASE 
  WHEN DATE(TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}'),'Europe/Berlin') >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 5 DAY) THEN DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 5 DAY)
  ELSE DATE(TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}'),'Europe/Berlin') END AS bisDatum
)
SELECT CAST(DATE_DIFF(bisDatum,DATE(TIMESTAMP('${__from:date:iso}'),'Europe/Berlin'), DAY) + 1 AS STRING)
FROM toDate

SELECT CASE "$LRA"
WHEN "NDR" THEN "_mapped"
WHEN "MDR" THEN "" END

SELECT CASE "$LRA"
WHEN "NDR" THEN "Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_daily_f_mapped"
WHEN "MDR" THEN "Piano.MDR_podcast_episode_daily_f" END

SELECT CASE "$LRA"
WHEN "NDR" THEN "Piano.NDR_podcast_platform_daily_f_mapped"
WHEN "MDR" THEN "Piano.MDR_podcast_platform_daily_f" END

SELECT CASE "$LRA"
WHEN "NDR" THEN "Piano.NDR_podcast_profiles"

SELECT CASE CONTAINS_SUBSTR("""${zeitraum}""", "DATE_ADD")

--Um Daten auswerten zu können, bitte gestern oder größere Zeiträume auswählen.
SELECT FORMAT_DATE("%d.%m.%y",DATE(TIMESTAMP('${__from:date:iso}'),'Europe/Berlin'))

SELECT CASE 
-- case: last x<24 hours
    WHEN TIMESTAMP_DIFF(TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}'), TIMESTAMP('${__from:date:iso}'), HOUR) = 24 AND EXTRACT(DAY FROM DATETIME('${__from:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin")) != EXTRACT(DAY FROM DATETIME('${__to:date:iso}', "Europe/Berlin")) OR TIMESTAMP_DIFF(TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}'), TIMESTAMP('${__from:date:iso}'), MINUTE) < 1439
    THEN   FORMAT_DATE("%d.%m.%y",DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE,INTERVAL 1 DAY))
-- SECOND case: today or bigger
    WHEN EXTRACT(DATE FROM TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}')) >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE("Europe/Berlin"), INTERVAL 4 DAY) AND EXTRACT(DATE FROM TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}')) >= "$datenstand_not_formated"
    THEN "$datenstand"
    WHEN EXTRACT(DATE FROM TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}')) >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE("Europe/Berlin"), INTERVAL 4 DAY) AND EXTRACT(DATE FROM TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}')) < "$datenstand_not_formated"
    THEN FORMAT_DATE("%d.%m.%y",DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE("Europe/Berlin"), INTERVAL 5 DAY))
ELSE CASE 
WHEN EXTRACT(DATE FROM TIMESTAMP('${__to:date:iso}')) >= "$datenstand_not_formated" THEN "$datenstand"
ELSE FORMAT_DATE("%d.%m.%y",DATE_SUB(DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin"), INTERVAL 0 DAY))
END 
END

        WHEN SUM(days91) > 0 AND SUM(daysCustom) > 0 THEN "days7, days14, days28, days56, days91, daysCustom"
        WHEN SUM(days56) > 0 AND SUM(daysCustom) > 0 THEN "days7, days14, days28, days56, daysCustom"
        WHEN SUM(days28) > 0 AND SUM(daysCustom) > 0 THEN "days7, days14, days28, daysCustom"
        WHEN SUM(days14) > 0 AND SUM(daysCustom) > 0 THEN "days7, days14, daysCustom"
        WHEN SUM(days7) > 0 AND SUM(daysCustom) > 0 THEN "days7, daysCustom"
        WHEN SUM(daysCustom) > 0 THEN "daysCustom"
        WHEN SUM(days91) > 0 THEN "days7, days14, days28, days56, days91"
        WHEN SUM(days56) > 0 THEN "days7, days14, days28, days56"
        WHEN SUM(days28) > 0 THEN "days7, days14, days28"
        WHEN SUM(days14) > 0 THEN "days7, days14"

        ELSE "daysElse"
    END AS col

)

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN SUM(days91) > 0 AND SUM(daysCustom) > 0 THEN "AVG(days7) as days7, AVG(days14) as days14, AVG(days28) as days28, AVG(days56) as days56, AVG(days91) as days91, AVG(daysCustom) as daysCustom"
        WHEN SUM(days56) > 0 AND SUM(daysCustom) > 0 THEN "AVG(days7) as days7, AVG(days14) as days14, AVG(days28) as days28, AVG(days56) as days56, AVG(daysCustom) as daysCustom"
        WHEN SUM(days28) > 0 AND SUM(daysCustom) > 0 THEN "AVG(days7) as days7, AVG(days14) as days14, AVG(days28) as days28, AVG(daysCustom) as daysCustom"
        WHEN SUM(days14) > 0 AND SUM(daysCustom) > 0 THEN "AVG(days7) as days7, AVG(days14) as days14, AVG(daysCustom) as daysCustom"
        WHEN SUM(days7) > 0 AND SUM(daysCustom) > 0 THEN "AVG(days7) as days7, AVG(daysCustom) as daysCustom"
        WHEN SUM(daysCustom) > 0 THEN "AVG(daysCustom) as daysCustom"
        WHEN SUM(days91) > 0 THEN "AVG(days7) as days7, AVG(days14) as days14, AVG(days28) as days28, AVG(days56) as days56, AVG(days91) as days91"
        WHEN SUM(days56) > 0 THEN "AVG(days7) as days7, AVG(days14) as days14, AVG(days28) as days28, AVG(days56) as days56"
        WHEN SUM(days28) > 0 THEN "AVG(days7) as days7, AVG(days14) as days14, AVG(days28) as days28"
        WHEN SUM(days14) > 0 THEN "AVG(days7) as days7, AVG(days14) as days14"
        WHEN SUM(days7) > 0 THEN "AVG(days7) as days7"
        ELSE " 0 as daysElse"
    END AS col
FROM (
    $avgEpisodesQuery
)

WITH episodes_headline AS (
  SELECT headline, first_pub_date, RANK() OVER(ORDER BY zugriffe DESC) as rang, podcast_title FROM(
  
  SELECT headline, MIN(publication_date_6) AS first_pub_date, SUM(IFNULL(m_zugriffe_1,0)) as zugriffe, podcast_title
  FROM `Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_daily_f_mapped`
  JOIN Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_publication_dates USING (headline)
  WHERE date BETWEEN DATE('2025-01-10T07:15:06.782Z', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('2025-04-10T06:15:06.782Z', "Europe/Berlin")
    AND publication_date_6 BETWEEN  DATE('2025-01-10T07:15:06.782Z', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('2025-04-10T06:15:06.782Z', "Europe/Berlin")
    AND CASE "Alle Bereiche"
      WHEN "Alle Bereiche" THEN TRUE
      ELSE branding = "Alle Bereiche"
    END
    AND CASE "All titles"
      WHEN "All titles" THEN TRUE
      ELSE REPLACE(headline, "'", "") IN UNNEST(ARRAY_CONCAT(ARRAY[], ARRAY['None'])) -- 
    END
  GROUP BY headline, podcast_title
  ORDER BY zugriffe DESC)
  ORDER BY rang ASC
  
  --LIMIT 8
),
date_range AS (
 SELECT
  headline,
  DATE_ADD(first_pub_date, INTERVAL seq DAY) AS date
FROM episodes_headline
CROSS JOIN UNNEST(
  GENERATE_ARRAY(0, LEAST(91, DATE_DIFF(CURRENT_DATE(), first_pub_date, DAY)))
) AS seq
),
cumulative_data AS (
  SELECT
  distinct
    d.headline,
    e.podcast_title,
    DATE_DIFF(d.date, e.first_pub_date, DAY) + 1 AS days_since_pub,
    SUM(IFNULL(p.m_zugriffe_1, 0)) OVER (PARTITION BY d.headline ORDER BY d.date) AS cumulative_zugriffe, 
    e.rang
  FROM date_range d
  JOIN episodes_headline e USING (headline)
  LEFT JOIN `Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_daily_f_mapped` p 
    ON d.headline = p.headline 
    AND d.date = p.date
), day_zero AS(
  SELECT distinct headline, rang, days_since_pub, cumulative_zugriffe
  FROM episodes_headline
  CROSS JOIN (SELECT 0 as days_since_pub, 0 as cumulative_zugriffe)
)
  SELECT
  podcast_title,
  ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN days_since_pub = 7 THEN cumulative_zugriffe END)) AS days7,
  ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN days_since_pub = 14 THEN cumulative_zugriffe END)) AS days14,
  ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN days_since_pub = 28 THEN cumulative_zugriffe END)) AS days28,
  ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN days_since_pub = 56 THEN cumulative_zugriffe END)) AS days56,
  ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN days_since_pub = 91 THEN cumulative_zugriffe END)) AS days91, 
  ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN days_since_pub = 28 THEN cumulative_zugriffe END)) AS daysCustom,
FROM
  cumulative_data
WHERE
  days_since_pub IN (7, 14, 28, 28, 56, 91)
GROUP BY
  podcast_title

WITH cumulative_data AS (
  SELECT
    podcast_title,
    -- Calculate days since publication
    DATE_DIFF(d.date, MIN(publication_date_6) OVER (PARTITION BY d.headline), DAY) AS days_since_pub,
    -- Calculate cumulative sum of visits
    SUM(d.m_zugriffe_1) OVER (PARTITION BY d.headline ORDER BY d.date) AS cumulative_zugriffe
  FROM
    `Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_daily_f_mapped` d
    LEFT JOIN Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_publication_dates USING (headline)
  WHERE
    d.date BETWEEN DATE('2025-01-10T07:15:06.782Z', "Europe/Berlin")
    AND DATE('2025-04-10T06:15:06.782Z', "Europe/Berlin")
    AND publication_date_6 BETWEEN DATE('2025-01-10T07:15:06.782Z', "Europe/Berlin")
    AND DATE('2025-04-10T06:15:06.782Z', "Europe/Berlin")
    AND CASE "Alle Bereiche"
        WHEN "Alle Bereiche" THEN TRUE
        ELSE branding = "Alle Bereiche" END
    AND CASE  "All titles"
        WHEN "All titles" THEN TRUE
        ELSE podcast_title = "All titles" END
)SELECT podcast_title, AVG(days7), AVG(days14), AVG(days28), AVG(days56), AVG(days91), AVG(daysCustom)
  SELECT
  podcast_title,
  ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN days_since_pub = 7 THEN cumulative_zugriffe END)) AS days7,
  ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN days_since_pub = 14 THEN cumulative_zugriffe END)) AS days14,
  ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN days_since_pub = 28 THEN cumulative_zugriffe END)) AS days28,
  ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN days_since_pub = 56 THEN cumulative_zugriffe END)) AS days56,
  ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN days_since_pub = 91 THEN cumulative_zugriffe END)) AS days91, 
  ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN days_since_pub = 28 THEN cumulative_zugriffe END)) AS daysCustom,
FROM
  cumulative_data
WHERE
  days_since_pub IN (7, 14, 28, 28, 56, 91)
GROUP BY
  podcast_title

  (
    SELECT 
      DISTINCT CAST(broadcast_id[0] AS STRING) AS broadcast_id
    FROM 
      $profiles_dataset
    WHERE

      AND ("""$Podcast""" = "All titles" OR broadcast_id[0] = "$broadcast_id_branding")

WITH nutzer AS (
  SELECT
CASE
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.login}", "dev") THEN "dev"
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.login}", "mefo") THEN "mefo"
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.email}", "@") THEN
      REGEXP_EXTRACT("${__user.email}", r'@([^\.]+)')  -- Extracts part after '@' and before the first '.' Example: ad.westphal@ndr.de => ndr
    WHEN NOT CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.email}", "@")
         AND (CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.email}", "viewer") 
         OR CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.email}", "podcast")) THEN
            REGEXP_EXTRACT("${__user.email}", r'^([^-\s]+)')  -- Extracts part before the first '-'. Example: ndr-viewer => ndr
    ELSE
      "Anonym"
  END AS nutzer_lra
),
filter_string AS (
  SELECT """
LRA=${LRA}|::|Bereich=${Bereich}|::|Podcast=${Podcast}|::|Episode=${Episode}|::|Podcastsuche=${AllePodcasts}|::|Zeitraum_von=${fromDay}|::|Zeitraum_bis=${toDay_NDR}
""" AS filter
)

SELECT CONCAT(
  "https://vqggwrz.pa-cd.com/event?s=645199&idclient=minerva&events=%5B%7B%22name%22%3A%22page.display%22%2C%22data%22%3A%7B%22page%22%3A%22",
  "${__dashboard.name}",
  "%22%2C%22m_visits%22%3A1%2C%22minerva_dashboard_id%22%3A%22",
  "${__dashboard.uid}",
  "%22%2C%22minerva_lra%22%3A%22",
  nutzer.nutzer_lra,
  "%22%2C%22minerva_filter%22%3A%22",
  filter_string.filter,
  "%22%7D%7D%5D"
) AS event_url
FROM nutzer, filter_string
